channel.title: Outdoor on Gladys Fang's Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Outdoor on Gladys Fang's Stuff

item.title: Ski/Snowboard Resorts Ranked, 2020-21
item.description: Snowboarded for 50 days this season. Wish I could say this every year. Here are the reviews! Winter Park/ Mary Jane Best tree runs! Practically skiable everywhere, good food, and Eagle Wind if you got lucky. Snowbird Steep, Scary but So Much Fun! Aspen Highlands Personally I love hard workouts, and nothing beats the hike up Highland bowl. Awesome trees, that chair was slow though.
